ygData.subject: Getting our Concerns Noticed
ygData.msgSnippet: I know I ve plagued you poor people with my opinions aplenty as of late, so I won t drag you thru them again, at least not yet. But, I would like to know
ygData.messageBody:
I know I've plagued you poor people with my opinions aplenty as of
late, so I won't drag you thru them again, at least not yet.

But, I would like to know others opinions on how we should bring our
concerns to the people who just might actually do something about it.

My idea is to do a massive in-game /feedback on a Friday or Saturday
night with all willing SKs on all servers.

I am open to all other ideas of course.

Bathory
Cazic-Thule
